articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Top central bankers deliver a hawkish message at Jackson Hole - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Policy makers in Europe and the US, battling the hottest inflation in decades, are resolutely raising rates and pushed back against suggestions they will waver if their economies falter while price pressures remain too high
articles.content: The worlds top central bankers delivered a stern and unified message on the need to curb inflation, declaring at Jackson Hole that it is broad based, here to stay and will require their forceful acti… [+5061 chars]

articles.author: Hayden Vernon
articles.title: Dinosaur remains found in Portuguese back garden could be Europe's largest ever find - The Irish Times
articles.description: Palaeontologists have begun unearthing the vertebrae and ribs of what they think is a brachiosaurid sauropod
articles.content:
The remains of what could be the largest dinosaur ever found in Europe have been uncovered in a back garden in Portugal.
